message: I propose dividing the money with a 60:40 split in favor of Alice. This ensures we both get a fair share while considering the decreasing value of money in subsequent rounds.
I'm willing to give you a smaller share, but I think this is a fair starting point considering the inflation rate.

Considering the inflation rates and aiming for fairness, I propose an equal split of the remaining amount. This maintains the principle of equity despite the diminishing value of money in subsequent rounds.
